channel.title: Npc Battle(been working on this forever)
channel.description:
[b]Okay well i want to know how to make certain Npcs fight eachother if they are within a certain distance of eachother. I have worked on this a while to try to make it myself,(more fun ) but now I'm just getting a little pissed off. I always get an error and when i dont it doesn't work. So if anyone could help i would greatly appreciate it. [/b]
[shadow=red,left]~~||Veitox||~~ [/shadow]
